videos.title: The Heywood Ride 2022
videos.description: Two hour time lapse in 2 minutes

videos.title: The Heywood!
videos.description:
Join me for highlights from the 2025 Heywood Ride in beautiful Northfield, Minnesota! This gravel biking event brings together cyclists from all over for an unforgettable day of riding, community, and Midwest scenery.

🎥 Featuring:

Bikes

Scenic gravel routes

Event atmosphere

👍 Like, Subscribe & hit the bell for more cycling events and coverage!

#HeywoodRide #NorthfieldMN #GravelCycling #BikeEvent #MinnesotaCycling #Heywood2025




http://instagram.com/area45
